Text: I have to say, after doing it the annoying way several times this is by far the best upgrade ever! Thanks for the download. Ill hang on to this on my flash drive :D

@Crusnikk:
I used to always laugh when I saw WinRAR/WinZip posted in forums, and the file itself is compressed - Nobody ever stops to think about how they will extract it once they get it LOL - I know a lot of people don't trust self-compiled EXEs, but with compression programs, it's pretty much the ONLY way to do it right :-P
Well one could always download the demo/trial versions to do the unpack, uninstall the demo/trial or use the keygen/key/patch to turn the demo/trial into the real thing... :)
Isn't it just so much easier this way, though? LOL

@ dogmeat thats the way I usually do it. however i have wished for the program, what relentlesstech has provided, for a long time. nonetheless, he has made me happy! I should also mention i trust your torrent too!

@Crusnikk:
Thank you!  It took a long time of having quality torrents to become 'Trusted', which is tough when only about 20% of downloaders actually SEED when finished :-P

@stationx:
You obviously need a better A/V o.O

Simply perfect, installed like a charm.

Side question:  Have used this and *other* versions of winrar (on 3 different OS's) to compress a 1gb file when making a rar, yet the 1gb still comes out as exact same size when rar'ed.  Any ideas why?

Otherwise this file is perfect.  Thank you.

@extracube:
If you were trying to compress an audio file, video file, or ISO (Also most EXEs), they are already compressed as much as they can be - There have been many times that I RAR'd an album folder, and there was no change at all in the file size, even with max compression ...

My Norman Security Suite went to town on this one :(

As you are a trusted uploader, I took the chance to disable scanner while installing. No problems with any of the installed files.

Works great, thanks :)

@shallow02:

I'm really surprised that it threw up a false-positive - I haven't had anybody tell me that in ages, and I've been re-using the 'keygen' for any updates - It IS safe, though LOL :-)

Using win8 now.
Keygen don't seem to work. Winrar says it's a 40 day trial even after keygen is "successful" 
Tried 64-bits version.

I have used this torrent on win7 with success.

@Lasergurka:
I have it registered in Windows 8 Pro x64 - Did you right-click the keygen and 'Run as Admin'?
